title: Top 5 Cybersecurity Tips for Small Businesses
author: Sandra Chinonso
excerpt: Essential cybersecurity practices that every small business owner should implement to protect their assets.
content:
Small businesses are increasingly targeted by cyberattacks. Here are five crucial tips to enhance your security posture...

1.  Use Strong, Unique Passwords
2.  Enable Multi-Factor Authentication
3.  Regularly Update Software
4.  Backup Your Data
5.  Train Your Employees
